snippet.title: Train Sim World 3 - Announce Trailer - Out Sep 6th!
snippet.description:
The future of Train Sim World is coming. Get ready to master the machine and battle the elements on September 6th with Train Sim World 3, available on Steam, PlayStation, Xbox, Xbox Game Pass and Epic Games Store. 

Train Sim World 3 features a brand-new dynamic weather system with volumetric skies, all powered by a new lighting system. Drive your loco through the extremes of weather like heavy snow and thunderstorms! Standard Edition ships with three route expansions, nine high-powered locomotives which include BNSF for the first time in Train Sim World and much, much more .

Find out more here: https://www.trainsimworld.com 

When you pre-order Train Sim World 3 you'll have 4-day Early Access and a bonus decal pack to use within the livery editor to share on Creators Club.

Pre-Order it now on PlayStation, Xbox, Steam and Epic Games Store. 🖥️ 🎮 

🖥️ Steam: https://bit.ly/TSW3-Steam 
🖥️ Epic Games Store: https://bit.ly/TSW3-EpicGames
🎮 Xbox: https://bit.ly/TSW3-XBOX 
🎮 PlayStation: https://bit.ly/TSW3-PS

---------------------------------------------------------------
Follow us on our social channels: 
Facebook: https://bit.ly/32c9Jdn
Twitter: https://bit.ly/2TPAfVu
Instagram: https://bit.ly/362LaRx

ESRB Rating: Everyone

#TrainSimWorld
